services.title: Services assigned to you
services.description: These are the services you can perform at this location with your current rates.

emptyState.title: No services assigned
emptyState.description: You don't have any services assigned at this location yet. Contact your manager to get services assigned.

bundles.title: Bundles you can perform
bundles.description: These bundles include at least one service you're assigned to at this location.

emptyState.title: No bundles include your services
emptyState.description: You'll see bundles here when they include at least one service you can perform at this location.

noLocations.title: No locations assigned
noLocations.description: You're not assigned to any locations yet. Contact your manager to get assigned to locations.

selectLocation.title: Select a location
selectLocation.description: Choose a location from the list to view your assigned services and bundles.
